ygData.subject: Re: Selo's and SOW experiment and a bit on Koalindl Fish
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you ever /follow someone, the game adjusts your speed to match theirs by rapidly cycling you between run and walk.  If you stop following them while
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Sep 1999, Katy Westerman wrote:
>
> About the walking thing. I noticed this last night, and when I
> checked, I had actually been switched to WALK instead of RUN. I know
> I was running in the first place so this was really weird. I didn't,
> however, test it further as we were soon running from Sand Giants in
> Oasis and I forgot about it.

If you ever /follow someone, the game adjusts your speed to
match theirs by rapidly cycling you between run and walk. If
you stop following them while stopped, you will be in walk
mode. There also seem to be some other odd cases where you'll
switch to walk, but they're rare enough that I haven't figured
out how they work yet.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
